description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Elise</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
Shuffle a Elise into your deck.
flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
name: Elise's Crawling Sensation
